�Apewing�      �Electronet�



   Apewing jumps up.  During the jump, he starts flapping his wings and 
gains some distance between him and the Earth.  Apewing then fires 2 
missles, one missle at Terrataur and one missle at Aquataur's back.

   Electronet fires 4 Electric blast at Train wreck and fires 4 optics at 
Aerotaur.

>From: Rudra656@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Run away to fight another day
>Date: Mon, 16 Jul 2001 19:09:46 EDT
>
>::Terrataur/Aquataur/Pyrotaur::
>     They arrive at the battle near the Chivtron base and survey the scene.
>Terrataur eventually spots Aerotaur fighting with Unitron in the sky.  She
>spots the shots flying at him from Rainchark and Apewing.  She signals
>Aquataur and Pyrotaur to go after Rainchark.  She sprints off and fires a
>high power blast out of each hand at Apewing.  "THE CAVALRY HAS ARRIVED!"
>
>     Aquataur fires 8 blue optic blasts at Rainchark, trying to get his
>attention.  Pyrotaur, using his flame-thrower as a kind of jet propulsion,
>flew at him behind the optic shots swinging his flame sword.
